item.description:
We invite you all to Panera Bread in Dedham for a free get-together on Sunday, October 4th from 6:30 to 8:30 PM. Feel free to bring a friend, buy a cup of coffee or a light dinner or dessert, mix and mingle and meet new friends.

Please RSVP only if you are attending or plan to.

Please check-in with Barry or Stan.

PLACE: Panera Bread, 797 Providence Hwy., Dedham, MA 02026
DATE: Sunday, October 4, 2009
TIME: 6:30 â€“ 8:30 PM
DRESS: Casual
FEE: This meetup is FREE so you only pay for what you eat or drink.
item.how_to_find_us: After you enter the restaurant, we'll be on the left. Please check in with Barry or Stan.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Free meetup at Panera Bread, Rt.1, Dedham, MA
